TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AcceptCertificateHandler(object o, AcceptCertificateArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed AcceptCertificateHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the AcceptCertificateHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the AcceptCertificateHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the AcceptCertificateHandler is removed from the event.
